about_the_game:
FaceRig is now retired, new customers can check out


The FaceRig support for Leap Motion™ Controller DLC enables you to add this sensor to the FaceRig multiple sensors update.
You can combine the Leap Motion™ Controller (for hand tracking) with another regular camera (for face tracking).

The FaceRig support for Leap Motion™ Controller DLC only works if you have the Leap Motion™ Controller.
